# Thomas Bustos - Site Guide for LLMs

## Who is Thomas Bustos?
Builder, Founder, and Learner. Co-founding Radiance and building The SOURCE. Host of Let's Talk AI podcast with 90+ episodes featuring founders and leaders in tech.

## Start here
- Homepage: https://thomasbustos.com/
- Mission: https://thomasbustos.com/mission

## Key pages
- Newsletter: https://thomasbustos.com/newsletter - Weekly insights on AI, startups, and building
- Events: https://thomasbustos.com/events - Speaking engagements and appearances
- Library: https://thomasbustos.com/library - Books I've read and recommend

## What Thomas is known for
- Building AI-powered products
- Hosting conversations with tech founders
- Writing about startups, AI, and personal growth
